topic.title: Change EON log level to DEBUG

body.p:
To change the EON log level to DEBUG, do the following:
Change the directory. The eon.conf.j2 is present in following directories:cd /home/stack/helion/hos/ansible/roles/eon-common/templates
Edit the DEFAULT section in eon.conf.j2 as below:[DEFAULT] debug = True
3. Edit the logger_root section in logging.conf.j2 as below [logger_root] qualname: root handlers: watchedfile, logstash level: DEBUG
Commit your configuration cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Execute eon reconfigure playbookcd /home/stack/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible; ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts eon-reconfigure.yml
